scopes.identity.readonly: See your personal information, such as your first name, last name, and favorite station.
scopes.identity.write: Update your personal information, such as your favorite station(s) or program(s) you follow, on your behalf.
scopes.listening.readonly: See your NPR One listening history and get audio recommendations.
scopes.listening.write: Record that you have heard, marked as interesting, and/or skipped NPR One stories in order to personalize future audio recommendations.
scopes.localactivation: Connect you with your local NPR member station for communication purposes.

methods.description: List stations close to you or filter by search criteria

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: Your access token from the Authorization Service. Should start with `Bearer`, followed by a space, followed by the token.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Search terms to search on; can be a station name, network name, call letters, or zipcode

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: A city to look for stations from; intended to be paired with `state`

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: A state to look for stations from (using the 2-letter abbreviation); intended to be paired with `city`

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: A latitude value from a geographic coordinate system; only works if paired with `lon`

parameters.name: lon
parameters.description: A longitude value from a geographic coordinate system; only works if paired with `lat`

responses.description: A collection of stations close to you or filtered by search criteria
A Collection.doc+JSON representation of an error result from an API call
A Collection.doc+JSON representation of an error result from an API call
A Collection.doc+JSON representation of an error result from an API call
A Collection.doc+JSON representation of an error result from an API call
A Collection.doc+JSON representation of an error result from an API call

methods.description: Retrieve metadata for the station with the given numeric ID

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: Your access token from the Authorization Service. Should start with `Bearer`, followed by a space, followed by the token.

parameters.name: stationId
parameters.description: The numeric ID of a station

responses.description: A Collection.doc+JSON representation of an error result from an API call
A Collection.doc+JSON representation of an error result from an API call
A Collection.doc+JSON representation of an error result from an API call

apiDescription: Allows clients to look up NPR member station information
